name: Pagoda
description: Summons imps onto the battlefield.

name: Vampirism
description: Unit's attacks heal it for 20% of damage dealt.

name: Cemetery
description: In an adjacent unit dies in battle, summons an imp to fight in its place.

name: Imp
description: Fast and aggressive troop with many small units.

name: Mangler
description: Area damage turret. Every year, sacrifices an adjacent unit per level to gain +2 damage.

name: Carnage
description: Unit explodes when killed, dealing 10% HP as area damage.

name: Bomber
description: Runs towards the enemy and explodes, dealing area damage.

name: Demon's Altar
description: Summons one demon per level. For each dead ally, grows permanently 0.5% stronger.

name: Sacrifice
description: Destroy target plot to level up adjacent plots.

name: Palace
description: Destroy target plot to level up adjacent plots.

name: OverInvest
description: Spend 30 gold to increase every stat of a troop or tower by 15%.

name: Dispenser
description: Single-target tower. Gains +1% attack speed for each 1 gold you receive.

name: Thief
description: Assassin troop that jumps to enemy's backline.

name: Beacon
description: Every year, adds +2% attack speed to adjacent troops and buildings.

name: Midas Touch
description: When this troop kills, there's a 2% chance to receive 1 gold.

name: Mercenary
description: Strong but fickle warriors for hire. You always have 1 unit for each 15 gold you own.

name: Vault
description: Receive gold at the end of every year.

name: Mortgage
description: Destroy target plot to receive to gold for each level it had.

name: Treant
description: Creates a healing area on the ground.

name: Forest
description: Every year, adds +2% HP to adjacent troops.

name: Procreate
description: Adds 9 units to the selected troop.

name: Spore
description: Summons a fighting spore every 5 seconds in battle. Spores accumulate every battle.

name: Elf
description: Ranged sniper troop. Always attacks the most distant target.

name: Venom
description: Unit's attacks apply 1 poison stack to the enemy.

name: Orchard
description: Creates roots that trap enemies.

name: Clone
description: Clone the card of the selected plot.

name: Boar
description: Can be mounted by adjacent troops. For each 1 HP it has, increases rider stats by 1%.

name: Warlord
description: Shoots banners that add Warlord's stats to target allies

name: Camp
description: When a card is placed on an empty plot Camp's adjacent plots gain stats

name: Dragon's Den
description: Does a single attack per battle in a line. Gets 20% stronger each time a plot is destroyed

name: Mob
description: Gains a unit for each adjacent unit added

name: Migration
description: Moves target to an empty adjacent plot and gives +10% Damage and HP

name: Freeze
description: Attacks slow the enemy's movement and attack speed by 20%

name: Swords
description: Adds 5 damage or +5% damage, whichever's higher

name: Shields
description: Adds 10 health or +10% health, whichever's higher

name: Raptor
description: Can be mounted by adjacent troops. Sums its stats with the rider and pierces through the frontline

name: Castle
description: Hurls a stone projectile onto your enemies.

name: Steel Coat
description: Cancels the first hit the target unit would take every battle.

name: Farm
description: Every year, adds units to one adjacent troop.

name: Soldier
description: Well-balanced melee troop.

name: Archer
description: Deals weak but fast ranged damage.

name: Scout Tower
description: Shoots powerful single-target arrows.

name: Paladin
description: Highly defensive melee troop.

name: Blacksmith
description: Every year adds attack damage to adjacent troops and buildings.

name: Wildcard
description: Levels up target plot.

name: Converter
description: Turns enemies into rats fighting for you. Rats inherit Converter's stats.

name: Mothership
description: Flies towards enemies like a unit. Can be controlled on the battlefield.

name: Overhaul
description: Destroy target plot to level up two random plots. Each use, one more plot is leveled up.

name: Concabulator
description: When this building reaches level 3, it levels up all your plots.

name: Precision
description: One hit is always critical.

name: Defender
description: Tanker unit that doesn't attack but reflects all taken damage.

name: Reinforce
description: Unit gains +1% damage whenever any plot levels up.

name: Lab Rat
description: Disposable melee troop. Levels up whenever adjacent plots level up. Deals damage to bosses instead.

name: Executioner
description: Ranged troop. Always attacks the enemy with the lowest health.

name: Scapegoat
description: Passive backline unit. If killed in battle, generates 3 gold per level.

name: Temple
description: Increases 10% of a random stat of a random plot.

name: Patronage
description: Levels up your base plot by 3 levels.

name: Shrine
description: Spends 9 gold every year to level up a random plot. Costs 3 less gold per level.

name: Ogre
description: Lonely unit. Every year, increases 5% of all stats for each adjacent empty plot.

name: Razing
description: Destroys target plot forever. Automatically triggers a Royal Council event.

name: Gigantify
description: Doubles the size, damage, and HP of target troop.

name: Slime
description: Proliferating troop that multiplies itself to one empty adjacent plot every year.

name: Unify
description: Sacrifices all troops adjacent to target. Target plot gains the number of units sacrificed.

name: Echoform
description: Duplicates target plot and all its stats to one empty adjacent plot.

name: Haste
description: Increases target's movement speed by 200%.

name: XRay
description: Levels up all plots diagonal to the target plot.

name: Citadel
description: Strikes your opponents with chaining lightning bolts.

name: Static
description: Unit's attacks trigger a lightning chain. Deals +1 damage and +1 chain per stack.

name: Spire
description: Heals your units that are closest to death during battle.

name: Combustion
description: Unit causes area damage equal to 20% of its attack when it kills an enemy.

name: Wizard
description: Ranged troop. Casts powerful attacks at a slow rate.

name: Shaman
description: Buffs allies' attack damage based on its own damage.

name: Library
description: Every year, has a 50% chance of duplicating a stack of one adjacent troop.

name: Warlock
description: Sturdy troop that deals melee area damage.

name: Offering
description: Destroy target plot to receive 3 random tome cards.

name: Stronghold
description: Summons towers that shoot nearby enemies.

name: Ballista
description: Ranged troop that shoots huge bolts with piercing damage.

name: Trebuchet
description: Multi-projectile tower. Shoots one extra projectile per building in your kingdom.

name: Trapper
description: Builds traps that inflict damage. Untriggered traps accumulate between battles.

name: WallMaker
description: Builds defensive walls in your kingdom.

name: Flametower
description: A mobile tower that moves onto the battlefield to burn enemies.

name: Quarry
description: Adds damage to all towers every year.

name: Cauldron
description: All adjacent plots now deal poison damage.

name: Earthworks
description: Unlocks target's adjacent plots. Target's cards return to your hand, up to 3 copies.
